name: Mine Digger
description: Mine Digger is an arcade strategy game when you dig holes to find treasures.   The Treasure can be used to shop for upgrades.  But be careful.  Your Treasure is also your score, and will be your final score when you either die from Oxygen running  out, or falling into lava.  This is a prototype, so there are glitches and bugs.  If you get stuck, you might have to close and re-open the game.  Other than that, feel free to play the in-game tutorial to learn the ropes.  Happy gaming.
